Text.val: 30.07.2012 GB SCR17447 Changed value of the parameter PI.TEXT2 (string is concatenation with 6 independent parts )
18.05.2011 SH SCR16387 Removed call of GB002
23.03.2011 SH SCR16264 Set exchange rates to heller rates if daily rates = 0
-- for some currencies, the calculation has to be done without decimals
... errors have to be written to MQ11
-- source/target currency are the same (error code = 999)
-- input amount = 0, nothing has to be recalculated (error code = 999)
-- administration number rates not delivered (error code = 1)
-- Error: Input currency not found (error code = 2)
-- Error: Output currency not found (error code = 3)
-- For other date and in/out currency are both no euro currencies
-- Euro currencies always in Factorlink rate
